short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks youtube mixes from from recommendations and from "youtube.com/results" page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is open source: https://github.com/molodchyk/YoutubeMixBlocker. Any feedback on how this extension can be improved is highly valued and will make it better for everyone. I encourage you to leave a review here or open the Issue on GitHub or write to me at molodchykr@gmail.com.

YouTube mix blocker is an extension that blocks YouTube mixes from recommended or from "youtube.com/results" page. That's it.

Changelog

Version 1.4: 

-works on recommended page now

Version 1.0: 

-blocks any YouTube Mixes from the search "youtube.com/results" page
